text:
I just created a workflow action via API but the custom action is not showing up in a sample workflow

Can anyone help? :confused:

If there were no errors and it looks like the API call was successful and the parameters are all for sure correct then contact support. If when you made the API call it did have an error look at the error message and error code received, that should give you hints as to what went wrong. If you post the error here we can probably help you diagnose the issue

No, there's no error and response returned OK

I will get in touch with support then.

Is there a UI in developer's dashboard to view unpublished custom actions?

```Publishing your custom action

By default, your custom action is created in an unpublished state, and will only be visible in the developer portal associated with your HubSpot application```
Hey, I appreciate your time and response <@U7SL518D6>. Thank you!
